snippet: A 16-year-old has been charged as an adult with murder in the shooting death of a Southern California police officer in what investigators called a botched robbery.
abstract: Sixteen-year-old Abel Diaz is charge as adult in murder of Police Officer Ricardo Galvez in Los Angeles area town of Downey, Calif.
lead_paragraph: A 16-year-old has been charged as an adult with murder in the shooting death of a Southern California police officer in what investigators called a botched robbery.

headline.main: California: Teenager Charged in Police Officer’s Killing
headline.print_headline: California: Teenager Charged in Police Officer’s Killing
